predictions.text: As of 2025-11-12 00:00 UTC, a lapse in U.S. federal appropriations will still be in effect (no enacted funding measure reopening the government).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm via OMB/White House announcements, Congressional records, and major agency status pages (e.g., OPM, DHS). A continued shutdown is verified if no law has been enacted restoring appropriations to reopen shuttered agencies by the stated time.
monitoring_signals: Congressional bill tracker for enacted CR/appropriations
White House/OMB statements on shutdown status
Agency contingency-status pages (OPM, DHS, DOI)
predictions.rationale: Talks remain stalled; missed jobs report underscores unresolved funding. Odds favor continued lapse short-term.

predictions.text: No FAA-licensed U.S. commercial orbital launches will occur between 2025-11-06 00:00 UTC and 2025-11-20 23:59 UTC.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check FAA commercial space license/permit activity and independent launch logs (e.g., NextSpaceflight). If zero FAA-licensed U.S. orbital launches are recorded in this window, the prediction is correct.
monitoring_signals: FAA commercial space licensing updates
NextSpaceflight launch log for U.S. orbital attempts
Provider updates (SpaceX, ULA, Rocket Lab) on schedules
predictions.rationale: Shutdown-driven FAA constraints and staffing risks are delaying commercial launches; providers signaling schedule slips.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 4.20% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the DGS2 series on FRED. A daily close value at or below 4.20% on any trading day through 2025-11-30 (UTC) satisfies the condition.
monitoring_signals: Futures-implied Fed path (Fed funds futures)
Economic surprise indices and shutdown-sensitive data delays
Auction results and front-end term premium measures
predictions.rationale: Growth jitters, shutdown drag, and easing inflation expectations bias the front end lower.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-08 close to 2025-11-30 close, the PHLX Semiconductor Index (SOX) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points on an adjusted-close basis.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute total return using adjusted closes from 2025-11-08 to 2025-11-30 for SOX and SPY. If SOX return minus SPY return ≤ -2.0 pp, the prediction is correct.
monitoring_signals: Semiconductor earnings/guidance and order books
Tariff/export-control headlines affecting chip supply chains
Rates/real-yield moves impacting growth multiples
predictions.rationale: Tech-led drawdown, tariff and export-control overhang, and multiple compression risk pressure semis.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Eli Lilly (LLY) or Novo Nordisk (NVO) will announce at least one new U.S. payer coverage expansion agreement for an obesity drug via company press release or SEC 8-K.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm a public company press release or SEC 8-K announcing expanded U.S. payer coverage terms for tirzepatide or semaglutide (obesity indication) dated by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: LLY and NVO investor relations pages
Large PBM and insurer policy bulletins (CVS, Elevance, UnitedHealth)
CMS or HHS guidance referencing anti-obesity meds
predictions.rationale: Policy momentum and negotiations favor near-term coverage expansions to broaden access.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, at least one U.S. federal civilian agency (non-DoD) will publicly disclose a material cybersecurity incident affecting operations via a press release, bulletin, or notice.
predictions.verification_criteria: A federal civilian agency (e.g., CBO, HHS, DOE, DHS components) posts an official statement acknowledging a significant cyber incident affecting operations by the deadline. Third-party media alone is insufficient without agency confirmation.
monitoring_signals: CISA advisories and emergency directives
Agency press rooms and data breach notifications
Indicators of compromise tied to recent campaigns
predictions.rationale: Recent federal breaches and ongoing campaigns suggest more disclosures in coming weeks.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show a weekly change in U.S. distillate fuel oil stocks of +2.5 million barrels or more in at least one report published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check the EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report tables. A reported weekly distillate stock change ≥ +2.5 million barrels in any report by the deadline verifies the prediction.
monitoring_signals: EIA product supplied trends and refinery utilization
Weather and freight indicators affecting diesel demand
Import/export flows of distillates
predictions.rationale: Seasonal builds plus softer freight demand increase odds of a sizable distillate inventory build.

predictions.text: The Cboe equity-only put/call ratio (CPCE) will close at or above 0.85 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use Cboe daily market statistics. If the reported equity-only put/call ratio (CPCE) daily close is ≥ 0.85 on any day through 2025-11-30 (UTC), the condition is met.
monitoring_signals: Cboe daily CPCE readings
Volatility indices (VIX/VXN) and breadth metrics
Macro shocks from shutdown and data delays
predictions.rationale: Risk-off swings and tech weakness tend to push hedging demand higher, lifting CPCE.

predictions.text: University of Michigan Index of Consumer Sentiment (preliminary) for November 2025 will print at or below 72.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify the preliminary November 2025 ICS value from the University of Michigan release or press note. A headline reading ≤ 72.0 confirms the prediction.
monitoring_signals: Gasoline price trend and GLP-1 coverage headlines
Equity market performance and media sentiment
Shutdown duration and fiscal policy uncertainty
predictions.rationale: Shutdown stress, data delays, and market volatility weigh on household perceptions.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the U.S. Treasury’s OFAC will announce at least one new Russia-related sanctions designation via an official press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check Treasury’s OFAC press releases. Any Russia-related designation announcement posted by 2025-11-30 qualifies, regardless of target sector or individuals.
monitoring_signals: OFAC press room and Federal Register notices
EU/US coordination statements on Russia
Conflict developments and evasion-enabler exposures
predictions.rationale: Regular cadence of Russia designations and evolving evasion networks make additional actions likely.
